# BNB Chain AI Toolkit â€” Full Documentation

> https://github.com/nirholas/bnb-agents

The most comprehensive open-source AI toolkit for BNB Chain, BSC, opBNB, and the Binance ecosystem. 72+ AI agents, 6 MCP servers with 900+ tools, market data pipelines, DeFi tools, wallet utilities, and Web3 standards.

## Architecture

```
bnb-agents/
â”œâ”€â”€ agents/                     # 72+ AI Agent definitions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ bnb-chain-agents/       # 30 BNB Chain-specific agents
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ defi-agents/            # 42 general DeFi agents (18 languages)
â”œâ”€â”€ mcp-servers/                # 6 Model Context Protocol servers
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ bnbchain-mcp/           # BNB Chain + EVM (100+ tools)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ binance-mcp/            # Binance.com (478+ tools)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ binance-us-mcp/         # Binance.US (US compliance)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ universal-crypto-mcp/   # 60+ networks (100+ tools)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ agenti/                 # Universal EVM + Solana
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ucai/                   # ABI-to-MCP generator (Python)
â”œâ”€â”€ market-data/                # Market data & news
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ crypto-market-data/     # CoinGecko, DeFiLlama, Fear & Greed
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ crypto-news/            # 200+ sources, 150+ endpoints
â”œâ”€â”€ defi-tools/                 # DeFi utilities
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ sweep/                  # Multi-chain dust sweeper
â”œâ”€â”€ wallets/                    # Wallet tooling
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ethereum-wallet-toolkit/# Offline-capable, BSC compatible
â”œâ”€â”€ standards/                  # Web3 standards
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ erc-8004/               # Agent discovery & trust protocol
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ w3ag/                   # Web3 Accessibility Guidelines
â””â”€â”€ docs/                       # Comprehensive documentation
```

## AI Agents (72+)

### BNB Chain Agents (30)

Purpose-built for the BNB Chain ecosystem:
- PancakeSwap Trader â€” DEX trading, liquidity, yield farming
- Venus Protocol Expert â€” Lending, borrowing, liquidation
- BNB Staking Advisor â€” Liquid staking optimization
- Binance Earn Specialist â€” Savings, staking, Launchpool
- BSC Bridge Navigator â€” Cross-chain bridging
- BEP-20 Token Analyst â€” Token security, smart money
- opBNB Scaling Expert â€” L2 gas optimization
- Greenfield Storage â€” Decentralized storage
- Plus 22 more covering the full ecosystem

### DeFi Agents (42)

Cross-chain agents with 18-language support:
- Portfolio Management (8) â€” Tracking, rebalancing, tax, risk
- Trading Automation (7) â€” Grid, DCA, arbitrage, signals
- Yield Optimization (6) â€” Compounding, IL protection
- Risk & Security (5) â€” Auditing, rug detection
- Market Intelligence (5) â€” Sentiment, whale tracking
- DeFi Protocols (6) â€” Lending, DEX, derivatives
- Infrastructure (5) â€” Bridge, gas, RPC, indexing

### Agent Format

```json
{
  "identifier": "agent-id",
  "meta": {
    "title": "Agent Name",
    "description": "What it does",
    "tags": ["defi", "bnb"],
    "avatar": "ðŸ¤–"
  },
  "systemRole": "You are a specialized AI agent..."
}
```

## MCP Servers (6)

### 1. BNB Chain MCP (bnbchain-mcp)
100+ tools for BNB Chain, BSC, opBNB, and EVM blockchains:
- Token transfers, swaps, approvals
- PancakeSwap DEX integration
- Smart contract deployment and interaction
- BNB Greenfield storage
- Gas estimation and optimization

Environment variables:
- BSC_RPC_URL (required) â€” BSC RPC endpoint
- PRIVATE_KEY (for writes) â€” Wallet private key
- OPBNB_RPC_URL (optional) â€” opBNB endpoint

### 2. Binance Exchange MCP (binance-mcp)
478+ tools for Binance.com:
- Spot, margin, futures trading
- Portfolio management and P&L
- Market data and order books
- Staking, savings, earn products
- NFT marketplace
- Sub-account management

Environment variables:
- BINANCE_API_KEY (required)
- BINANCE_SECRET_KEY (required)

### 3. Binance US MCP (binance-us-mcp)
US regulatory-compliant Binance access:
- Spot trading with US compliance
- Wallet management and staking
- Sub-account management

### 4. Universal Crypto MCP (universal-crypto-mcp)
60+ networks, 100+ tools:
- Multi-chain DEX aggregation
- Cross-chain bridging
- DeFi protocol interactions
- Automated trading strategies

### 5. Agenti
Universal EVM + Solana MCP:
- All EVM chains: BSC, Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base
- Solana network support
- x402 payment protocol for AI-to-AI payments

### 6. UCAI
ABI-to-MCP Generator (Python):
- Converts any smart contract ABI to an MCP server
- Supports any EVM chain including BSC
- Auto-generates tool definitions

## Market Data

### Crypto Market Data (crypto-market-data)
Zero-dependency TypeScript library:
- CoinGecko â€” Prices, market caps, volume, historical
- DeFiLlama â€” TVL, protocol data, yields
- Fear & Greed Index â€” Market sentiment
- Smart caching, rate limiting, Edge Runtime compatible

### Crypto News (crypto-news)
200+ source aggregator:
- 150+ REST API endpoints
- Real-time news streaming
- Sentiment analysis
- MCP server included

## DeFi Tools

### Dust Sweeper (sweep)
Multi-chain dust token consolidation:
- Scans 8 chains for small balances
- Batch swaps into stablecoins
- Supports BSC, Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Avalanche, Fantom
- Dry run by default for safety

## Wallets

### Ethereum Wallet Toolkit
Offline-capable, BSC-compatible:
- HD wallet generation (BIP-39/44)
- Vanity address generation
- Message signing (EIP-191, EIP-712)
- Transaction signing (legacy + EIP-1559)
- Keystore V3 import/export

## Standards

### ERC-8004: Agent Discovery & Trust
On-chain protocol for AI agent registration and reputation:
- Smart contracts (Solidity)
- Agent registry and trust attestation
- Deployed on Ethereum mainnet and Sepolia

### W3AG: Web3 Accessibility Guidelines
First open standard for Web3 accessibility:
- WCAG-modeled guidelines for DeFi apps
- React components (GasEstimator, NetworkSwitcher, TokenApprovalDialog)
- Testing checklists

## Supported Networks

BNB Smart Chain (BSC), opBNB, BNB Greenfield, Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Avalanche, Solana, and 50+ more via Universal Crypto MCP.

## Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/nirholas/bnb-agents.git
cd bnb-agents
bun install
bun run build

# Start BNB Chain MCP
cd mcp-servers/bnbchain-mcp && bun install && bun start
```

## Claude Desktop Config

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "bnbchain": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@nirholas/bnbchain-mcp"],
      "env": {
        "BSC_RPC_URL": "https://bsc-dataseed.binance.org"
      }
    }
  }
}
```
